sentence.Network_en: He repeated that he did not intend to be mealy-mouthed with the country's leaders.
sentence.Network_cn: 他重申道，他和国家领导人谈话时无意拐弯抹角。

sentence.Network_en: But if you don't, they say you are mealy mouthed forever!
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你不寄给他们, 他们说你说话总是拐弯抹角!

sentence.Network_en: Don't is so mealy mouthed, say what you mean!
sentence.Network_cn: 别这麽绕弯子了, 有话直说吧!

entry.tran: (食物)干巴巴的，干燥的,粉状的
entry.def: Food that is dry and powdery can be described as mealy .

example.ex: ...the mealy stodge of pulse, grain and potato dishes.
example.tran: 豆子、谷物和土豆等干巴巴的不易消化的食物

means.word_mean: 1. composed of or covered with relatively large particles;
